duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for accurate, timely payment to vendors.
Create and send invoices to customers, follow up for payments, apply /forecast cash.
Provide support for month end close activities.
Support multi-company general ledger and inter-company transactions.
Provide financial information to meet gov’t regulations.
Support business objectives by providing financial analysis activities.
Use advanced skills in MS Excel to pull data and produce reports to support the decision-making process.
Use knowledge of the financial industry to make recommendations based on findings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or Finance (Master's preferred)
